translations: v.没精打采地站（或坐、走）；把（帽）檐一边拉下（slouch 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 没精打采的, 懒散的

sentences.sentence: Slouching not only makes you look less attractive, it can also affect your health.
sentences.translation: 没精打采不仅使你看起来缺乏吸引力，而且影响你的健康。

sentences.sentence: Notice your mood, your energy levels, how your body feels, if you are frowning or slouching.
sentences.translation: 如果你正在发愁或无精打采，那么注意你的心情，你的精力，以及你身体的感觉。

sentences.sentence: Also, at all costs avoid the slouching shoulders or bad posture for that can ruin your picture.
sentences.translation: 此外，避免伛肩膀或其他一些不良姿势。
